ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] I need advise please
ygData.msgSnippet: I was 120 when the powered gloves were discovered.  Dumped a lot of cash into attempting rebreathers since it was the only thing sellable at the time.  Right
ygData.messageBody:
I was 120 when the powered gloves were discovered.  Dumped a lot of cash into attempting rebreathers since it was the only thing sellable at the time.  Right now, the only thing I attempt to make is watchman armor.  I will not try rebreathers unless someone wants to buy one.  My skill is now 157 and probably can make them without 'too many' failures.  Reason why I only attempt watchman armor is that it only costs 120pp per attempt.  Much better than the 1000pp for the rebreathers.

As for being stuck, I haven't seen a skill point increase since the last patch that changed the drop rate of haze panther eyes.  They probably broke it.  They suck.


At 07:04 AM 2/3/2001 -0500, you wrote:
I got my skill to 110 before powered gloves were discovered.  Because of this it cost me about 25k to get to 148 skill.  Since reaching 148, I've made 82 attempts at rebreathers and have only one skill increase to show for it.   =(
 
What has anyone else's skill increase rate been on rebreathers?
 
Boskonovitch
Frustrated Tinkerer on Fennin Ro, stuck at 149
